api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

contact_email.description: The email address of the contact you want to view automations for (either this or contact_id is required)

contact_id.description: The ID of the contact you want to view automations for (either this or contact_email is required)

limit.description: Limit of records per page (default and maximum is 20)

offset.description: Offset to start returning records from (default is 0)
